verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Earlier today] [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: sent] [ARG1: a furious tweet in which he " hereby demand[ed ] , and will do so officially tomorrow , " that the Department of Justice examine whether the government " infiltrated or surveilled the Trump Campaign for Political Purposes] . " ...
